short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search bookmarks, scan and remove dead links

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is in beta, free to try out!

Hey everyone! 🎉 I'm thrilled to introduce my new Chrome extension, Neon Bookmarks! 📑💫 This handy tool brings your bookmarks to life, making them easier to manage than ever before. Here’s what it can do:

🔍 Quick Search: Simply click the Neon Bookmarks icon, type in a keyword, and watch as your saved pages pop up instantly! Say goodbye to endless scrolling and hello to quick access!

🚫 Dead Link Scanner: Sick of broken links cluttering your bookmarks? Neon Bookmarks can scan for dead links and give you the option to delete them with just one click, keeping your list clean and efficient. (Scanning runs in the background every once a week)

Organize, clean, and search your bookmarks like never before! Download it, give it a try, and let me know what you think! 🌈💡
